credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor in honor of Thomas Murray
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 440 x 17 cm (14 ft. 5 1/4 in. x 6 11/16 in.)
title: Sarita
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain woven, patterned with resist paste (probably rice paste), dyed in indigo
description: Long, narrow cloth patterned with panels of geometric and figural motifs, including the sacred buffalo at one end, in tan and indigo blue.
name: Sarita
